K12D0597=D0984_H0537:211b-1: a'arya sarbba durga ti pa ri sho dha ni aushn'i sha bi dza ya n'a ma dh'a ra ni /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:211b-3: 'phags pa ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:211b-4: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:211b-6: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:211b-7: de nas lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa zhes bya
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:211b-8: ba zhig sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:211b-9: nang chos bzang lha'i mdun sa na gnas te /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:211b-10: lha'i gzhal yas khang chen po na lha'i longs spyod chen po dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:211b-11: lha'i bu mo'i tshogs chen pos bskor nas rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod de /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:211b-12: de lha'i longs spyod myong ba las mtshan mo sgra zhig thos pa /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212a-0: lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa zhag bdun gyi nyin par @212a *//
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212a-2: de 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling du skyes te /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212a-3: der yang 'gro ba bdun po myong bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212a-4: 'gro ba bdun po myong nas sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212a-5: brgya la nam zhig mir skyes par gyur na yang
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212a-6: der dbul por 'gyur zhing dmus long du 'gyur ro
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212a-8: de nas lha'i bu des sgra de thos nas 'jig
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212a-9: skrag sdangs te spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212a-10: des rings pa rings par lha'i dbang po brgya byin
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212a-11: ga la ba der song ste phyin nas de nas
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212a-12: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi rkang pa la phyag
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212a-13: 'tshal te brtabs par smra zhing de kyi hud kyi
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212a-14: hud ces smre sngags 'don bzhin du lha'i dbang po
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212a-15: brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212a-19: bdag deng lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis bskor te lha'i
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212a-20: longs spyod kyi dga' bas rtse zhing bde ba myong
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212a-21: ba las sgra zhig thos pa /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212a-22: lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa zhag bdun na 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212a-23: 'dzam bu'i gling du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212a-24: der yang 'gro ba bdun myong nas sems can dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212a-25: brgya la nam zhig mir skyes par gyur na yang
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212a-26: der de dbul por 'gyur zhing dmus long du yang
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212a-29: de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212a-30: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis lha'i bu
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212b-0: @212b shin tu brtan pa'i tshig de thos nas shin
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212b-1: tu ngo mtshar du 'dzin par 'gyur te /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212b-2: lha'i bu 'dis 'gro ba bdun po gang dag myong
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212b-3: bar 'gyur snyam du sems shing cang mi smra bar
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212b-12: 'gro ba bdun po de dag shin tu mi gtsang ba za ba myong bar 'gyur ba mthong ngo;/
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212b-13: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'gro ba
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212b-14: bdun po de dag mthong nas 'di snyam du ae
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212b-15: ma lha'i bu 'di sdug bsngal mi bzod pa chen
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212b-18: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par de'i skyabs dang
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212b-20: dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba su yod snyam du bsams so //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212b-21: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin nub mo de'i srod la spos dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212b-25: rgyan sna tshogs la sogs pa khyer nas bcom ldan
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212b-26: 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212b-27: / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212b-28: 'tshal te lan bdun bskor ba byas nas mchod pa
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212b-29: chen po byas te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212b-30: 'dug nas lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa'i 'gro ba
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212b-31: bdun po dag bcom ldan 'das la zhib tu gsol
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212b-32: / to // lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'gro
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212b-33: ba bdun po de dag gsol ma thag tu de
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:212b-34: nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gtsug tor nas 'od zer
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213a-1: ste; des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gnas
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213a-2: thams cad kun nas snang bar byas te slar log
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213a-3: nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgor zhugs so
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213a-4: // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213a-5: nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213a-6: // bka' stsal to // lha'i dbang po /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213a-7: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213a-8: de bzhin gshegs pas spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213a-9: / ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213a-10: sgrib pa dang sdug bsngal bar skye ba thams cad 'jig par byed pa /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213a-12: byol song gi skye gnas dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213a-13: gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad yongs su sbyong ba /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213a-14: bde 'gro'i lam du 'jog pa yod de /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213a-16: de lta bas na gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213a-17: zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213a-18: sbyong ba thos ma thag tu sgrib par 'gyur ba'i
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213a-19: sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin sna tshogs shin tu mang
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213a-21: skye ba yongs su dag pa'i rgyud thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213a-22: tshe rabs thams cad du yang tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213a-23: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213a-24: lha'i 'jig rten nas lha'i 'jig rten du 'gro bar 'gyur te /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213a-25: lha'i gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar du 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213a-27: de brjod ma thag tu tshe zad pa yang tshe
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213b-0: phyir nur bar @213b 'gyur ba'i las thob par 'gyur
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213b-1: ro // lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las yongs
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213b-2: su dag pa bsags pa bde bar reg pa la
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang de la gzigs so //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213b-5: de dag de la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par srung ba dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213b-8: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de la sems par 'gyur /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213b-9: brjod pa tsam gyis sems can dmyal ba dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213b-12: yi dvags kyi yul thams cad skem par 'gyur /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213b-17: de ltar de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213b-19: byang chub sems dpa'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo rnams phye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213b-20: de gang 'dod pa der 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213b-21: de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213b-23: gzungs de bka' stsal du gsol /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213b-24: sems can thams cad kyi srog la sman gdags pa bshad du gsol /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213b-25: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang bo brgya
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213b-26: byin gyis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas gzungs 'di
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:213b-28: aom na mo bha ga ba te sarbba tree lokya pra ti pam shisht'a ya buddha ya te na ma:/
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214a-2: bi sho dha ya bi sho dha ya /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214a-3: aa sa ma sa manta aa ba bh'a sa spha ra na ga ti /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214a-4: ga ga na sva bh'a ba bi shuddhe /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214a-6: sarbba ta th'a ga t'a: su ga ta ba ra ba tsa na /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214a-7: aa mri ta aa bhi shekshee ra /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214a-9: mandra pa dee:a'a ha ra a'a ha ra /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214a-10: ma ma a'a yu:sandh'a ra ni /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214a-11: sho dha ya sho dha ya /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214a-12: bi sho dha ya bi sho dha ya /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214a-13: ga ga na sva bh'a ba bi shuddhe /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214a-14: aushn'i sha bi dza ya pa ri shuddhe /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214a-15: sa ha sra rasmi sam tso di te /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214a-16: sarbba ta th'a ga ta aa ba lo ki ni /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214a-17: shatph'a ram mi t'a pa ri p'u ra ni /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214a-18: sarbba ta th'a ga ta m'a te da sha bh'u mi pra tishthi te /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214a-19: sarbba ta th'a ga t'a hri da ya aa dhishth'a na aa dhishthi te /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214a-22: badzra k'a ya sam ha ta na /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214a-24: sarbba karma a'a ba ra na bi shuddhe /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214a-26: ma ma a'a yur bi shuddhe /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214a-27: sarbba ta th'a ga t'a sa ma ya aa dhishth'a na aa dhishthi te /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214a-30: bi mu ni bi mu ni /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214a-38: pa ri shuddhe bi sphu ta /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214a-42: bi dza ya bi dza ya /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214a-45: sph'a ra ya sph'a ra ya /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214a-46: sarbba buddh'a aa dhishth'a na aa dhishth'i te /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214b-0: ma ma shi r'i ram sarba satv'a n'anytsa k'a ya pa ri @214b shuddhir bhra ba tum/
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214b-1: sa d'a me sarbba ga ti pa ri shuddhi shtsa /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214b-2: sarbba ta th'a ga t'a shtsa m'am sa ma shva sa yantu /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214b-5: bo dha ya bo dha ya /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214b-6: bi bo dha ya bi bo dha ya /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214b-7: mo tsa ya mo tsa ya /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214b-8: bi mo tsa ya bi mo tsa ya /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214b-9: sho dha ya sho dha ya /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214b-10: pi sho dha ya bi sho dha ya /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214b-12: mo tsa ya mo tsa ya /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214b-13: sa manta rasmi pa bi shuddhe /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214b-14: sarbba ta th'a ga t'a hri da ya aa dhishth'a na aa dhishth'i te /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214b-15: mu dre mu dre; ma h'a mu dre ma h'a mu dre mandr'a pa dee:sv'ah'a /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214b-17: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214b-18: ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214b-21: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214b-22: bde 'gro'i lam thams cad du 'gro ba dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214b-23: ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed pa 'di ni /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214b-24: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+g'a'i klung 'bum phrag bye
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214b-25: ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa brgyad kyi bye ma snyed
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214b-28: rjes su yi rang bar mdzad pa /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas btab pa ste /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214b-30: sems can thams cad bde 'gror 'gro bar bya ba dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214b-31: ngan 'gror lhung ba rnams bzlog pa dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214b-34: gshin rje'i 'jig rten la sogs pa sdug bsngal gyi
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:214b-35: gnas thams cad du sdug bsngal zhing nyam nga bar
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215a-0: sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtshor lhung ba'i sems can rnams @215a *//
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215a-1: rnam par grol bar bya ba'i phyir gsungs pa'o //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215a-2: de bzhin du sems can tshe thung zhing skal ba chung ba dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215a-5: sems can lam las nyams pa rnams kyi don du gzungs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du bzhag go /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215a-7: khyod kyis gzungs 'di zungs la lha'i bu shin tu brtan pa la sgrogs shig /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215a-8: bsgrags nas kyang gdon pa dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215a-9: kha ton du bya ba dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215a-15: kun chub par bya ba la de sbyor bar gyis shig dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215a-16: de ltar lha'i gnas thams cad na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215a-17: 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215a-19: bde ba'i phyir gzungs kyi phyag rgya dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215a-20: gsang sngags 'di dag khyod la gtad do //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215a-21: de'i phyir lha'i dbang po khyod kyis gzung bar bya'o //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215a-23: gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu bskal pa brgya stong
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215a-24: du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yongs su byang
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215a-25: bar 'gyur ro // skye bar skye ba rnam pa sna tshogs sems can dmyal ba dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215a-29: lha ma yin gyi ris dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215b-8: grog sbur la sogs pa'i srog chags kyi rigs su phyis mi skye bar shes par bya'o //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215b-9: gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad pa dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215b-10: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su skye ba ni /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215b-12: de rigs chen po 'di lta ste /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215b-13: bram ze'i rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu'am /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215b-14: rgyal rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu'am /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215b-15: tshong dpon gyi rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bur skye'o zhes da smra'o //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215b-17: de ltar na gzungs 'di'i mthus byang chub kyi snying
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215b-18: po la mthar thug gi bar du skye ba yongs
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215b-19: su dag pa chen po 'thob ste /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215b-27: dge zhing shis pa yin te /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215b-29: sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gtsug tor rnam
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215b-30: par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs ngan 'gro thams
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215b-31: cad yongs su sbyong ba 'di bzhag go /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215b-34: nor bu rin po che nyi ma'i snying po shin
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215b-35: tu dri ma med pa nam mkha' ltar yongs su
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215b-37: 'od zer gyi snang bas 'bar zhing 'dug go /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:215b-39: de bzhin du sems can de yang gos pa med par shes par bya'o //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216a-1: na; 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser ni /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216a-3: shin tu yongs su dag pa /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216a-7: de bzhin du sems can de yang shin tu yongs su dag par rig par bya ste /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216a-8: tshe rabs gzhan du yang de bzhin du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216a-10: gang na gzungs 'di rab tu ston pa dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216a-11: bye brag tu na yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216a-15: kha ton du byed pa dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216a-17: kun chub bar byed pa dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216a-19: 'dzin par 'gyur ba der 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag bar 'gyur /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216a-20: sems can dmyal ba thams cad rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216a-22: gzungs 'di yi ger bris te rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor gzhag par bya /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216a-25: mchod rten gyi srog shing gi steng du gzhag par bya'o /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216a-31: de las gzhan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216a-32: rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor bzhag pa mthong ngam /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216a-33: de dang de nye bar gnas par gyur na /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216a-34: tha na de'i grib mas phog gam /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216a-35: de'i rdul rlung gis btab pas phog na yang lha'i dbang po /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216a-36: sems can de la sdig pa thams cad dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216b-0: ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i 'jigs @216b pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216b-5: lha ma yin gyi ris thams cad du mi skye bar 'gyur ro; ;lha'i dbang po /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan cing
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216b-8: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216b-9: chub las phyir mi ldog par rig par bya'o //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216b-12: rim gro byed cing me tog dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216b-20: rgyan rnams kyis brgyan par byed pa dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216b-21: lam gyi bzhi mdor mchod rten byas te gzungs 'di bzhag pa la thal mo sbyor ba'am /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216b-23: bskor ba byed pa lta ci smos te /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216b-26: sems can chen por rig par bya'o //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216b-27: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras su rig par bya'o //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216b-28: chos kyi gnas su rig par bya'o //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216b-29: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten du rig par bya'o //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216b-30: de nas chos kyi rgyal po gshin rje nub mo
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216b-31: nam langs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216b-32: song ste bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog dang
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216b-34: rgyan la sogs pas mchod pa dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216b-35: bsti stang byas nas des bcom ldan 'das la lan
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:216b-36: bdun bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217a-0: la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol @217a *//
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217a-3: mthu che zhing phan yon che ba lags te /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217a-5: bdag kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217a-6: de'i slad bzhin du 'brang zhing kun tu bsrung ba
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217a-7: dang / yongs su bskyab pa'i slad du gnas par bgyi'o //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217a-8: sems can dmyal ba thams cad las de bzlog par bgyi'o //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217a-11: byas pa gzo bar bgyid cing byas pa mi gzo bar mi bgyid do //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217a-12: de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217a-13: la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bcom ldan 'das
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217a-16: gzungs 'di'i cho ga zhib mo dang /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217a-17: bgyi ba'i cho ga'i tshul rgyas par bshad du gsol /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217a-19: bzhi po dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217a-20: // nyon cig dang gzungs 'di'i bya ba'i tshul bshad par bya'o //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217a-21: sems can tshe thung ba'i don gyi phyir rigs kyi bu'am /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217a-22: rigs kyi bu mos tshes bco lnga'i zla ba nya
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217a-23: la khrus byas te lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217a-24: byas na / nges sems can tshe zad pa de'i
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217a-25: tshe phyir nur nas nad thams cad dang bral bar
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217a-26: byas na / 'gyur ro // sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217b-0: sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan 'gro thams cad las @217b yongs su thar par 'gyur ro //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217b-1: tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i srog
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217b-2: chags bya'i rna lam du gzungs 'di'i sgra bsgrag par
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217b-4: de'i ngan 'gro'i tha ma yin par rig par bya'o;
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217b-5: ;gang zhig nad chen pos btab ste sman pa thams
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217b-6: cad kyis bye brag ma phye ba de yang nad
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217b-7: de las yongs su thar par 'gyur ro //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217b-8: de'i ngan 'gror skye ba thams cad kyang rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217b-9: shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217b-10: de nyid de'i mngal gyi gnas tha ma yin par rig par bya'o //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217b-11: gang dang gang du skyes pa de dang der padma'i
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217b-12: snying po kho na las brdzus te skye bar 'gyur
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217b-13: ro // tshe rabs thams cad du yang tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217b-14: sems can sdig pa byed pa gang dag shi ba'i
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217b-15: dus byas pa de dag gi don du gzungs yungs
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217b-16: kar dag la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217b-17: brjod de / de dag gi rus gong rnams kyi steng du gtor na /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217b-22: de las gzhan ngan 'gro rnams su skyes par gyur kyang rung ste /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217b-23: de dag gzungs 'di'i mthus ngan 'gro de dag las
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217b-24: thar par 'gyur ro; ;de dag las thar nas kyang
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217b-26: su zhig 'di nyin gcig bzhin du lan nyi shu
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217b-27: rtsa re re yongs su brjod pa de 'jig rten
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:217b-28: mang po'i mchod pa'i 'os su 'gyur ro //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218a-2: rtag tu spro ba dang ldan pa dang; mya ngan las 'das pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218a-3: shi 'phos nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218a-4: de nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa sna tshogs su 'gro par 'gyur ro //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218a-5: der yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang phrad par 'gyur //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang dbugs 'byin par 'gyur /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung ston par 'gyur ro //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218a-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yang 'jig rten la snang bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218a-11: 'gro ba thams cad kyang sems can dmyal ba la
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218a-12: sogs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad las yongs su thar
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218a-13: par 'gyur ro // de dag gi 'gro ba thams
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218a-14: cad kyang yongs su dag cing tshe ring bar yang
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218a-15: par 'gyur ro // 'gyur ro // lha'i dbang bo /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218a-16: song la lha'i bu blo gros shin tu brtan pa la gzungs 'di rjes su ston la sgrogs shig /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218a-18: des na zhag bdun na lha'i bu shin tu brtan
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218a-19: pa'i 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dag cing tshe
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218a-22: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de bzhin
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218a-23: gshegs pa las rjes su bstan pa 'di blangs te
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218a-24: de'i gnas su phyin nas lha'i bu shin tu brtan
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218b-1: de nas lha'i bu des nyi ma bdun ba'i bar
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218b-2: du nyin drug mtshan drug tu gzungs 'di la brtson
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218b-3: par byas pa na de'i bsam pa thams cad phun
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218b-7: bde 'gro'i lam la yang dag gnas /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218b-8: tshe ring bar yang gyur nas aa la la sangs rgyas /
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218b-10: aa la la gzungs 'di lta bu 'jig rten du
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218b-11: byung ste; des bdag 'jigs pa chen po las yongs
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218b-13: zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218b-14: 'phags pa ngan 'gro thams cad yongs su sbyong ba
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218b-15: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs
K12D0597=D0984_H0537:218b-16: rdzogs so //// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
